snippet: The actor, who was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease in 1991, will reportedly star in a new series being developed by Sony Pictures Television that would start in the fall of 2013.
abstract: The actor, who was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease in 1991, will reportedly star in a new series being developed by Sony Pictures Television that would start in the fall of 2013.

headline.main: Michael J. Fox May Return to TV
headline.print_headline: Michael J. Fox May Return to TV
